code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';const instance=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL});instance.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('user_token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization=`Bearer ${token}`;}return config;});export default instance;
